name: How to rope a cow
description:
"The official tutorial to rope a cow"

It's time to stuck some cows in a loop! Use your lasso to catch the cows to preserve the balance between the universes and galaxies. Be careful! Cows are dangerous and your time decreases quickly.

***

***

Game playable with gamepad / keyboard and mouse. Some issues? Do you want to play the FULL HD (deluxe) game version? Just download the standalone version!

  • WASD or left joystick to move
  • Mouse or right joystick to look
  • Space bar or south button to jump
  • Left click or right trigger to shoot
  • P or start for pause menu

***

Some questions? Do you want to share your feedback? Or maybe you just want to talk with us? Anyway...

Keep in touch and join our Discord server!
